00015 #include "driverlistconnector.h"
00016 #include "driver.h"
00017 #include "measure.h"
00018 #include <qlineedit.h>
00019 #include <qpushbutton.h>
00020 #include <q3table.h>
00021 #include <q3listbox.h>
00022 #include <qlabel.h>
00023 #include <kiconloader.h>
00024 #include "ui_drivertool.h"
00025 #include "ui_drivercreate.h"
00026 
00027 typedef QForm<QDialog, Ui_DlgCreateDriver> DlgCreateDriver;
00028 
00029 XDriverListConnector::XDriverListConnector
00030 (const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &node, FrmDriver *item)
00031     : XListQConnector(node, item->m_tblDrivers),
00032       m_create(createOrphan<XNode>("Create", true)),
00033       m_release(createOrphan<XNode>("Release", true)),
00034       m_conCreate(xqcon_create<XQButtonConnector>(m_create, item->m_btnNew)),
00035       m_conRelease(xqcon_create<XQButtonConnector>(m_release, item->m_btnDelete))  
00036 {
00037     KIconLoader *loader = KIconLoader::global();
00038     item->m_btnNew->setIcon( loader->loadIcon("filenew",
00039                     KIconLoader::Toolbar, KIconLoader::SizeSmall, true ) );
00040     item->m_btnDelete->setIcon( loader->loadIcon("fileclose",
00041                     KIconLoader::Toolbar, KIconLoader::SizeSmall, true ) );
00042     
00043     connect(m_pItem, SIGNAL( clicked( int, int, int, const QPoint& )),
00044             this, SLOT(clicked( int, int, int, const QPoint& )) );
00045   
00046     m_pItem->setNumCols(3);
00047     double def = 50;
00048     m_pItem->setColumnWidth(0, (int)(def * 1.5));
00049     m_pItem->setColumnWidth(1, (int)(def * 1.0));
00050     m_pItem->setColumnWidth(2, (int)(def * 4.5));
00051     QStringList labels;
00052     labels += i18n("Driver");
00053     labels += i18n("Type");
00054     labels += i18n("Recorded Time");
00055     m_pItem->setColumnLabels(labels);
00056 
00057     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(node->children());
00058     if(list) { 
00059         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++)
00060             onCatch(*it);
00061     }
00062 
00063     m_lsnOnCreateTouched = m_create->onTouch().connectWeak(shared_from_this(),
00064                                                            &XDriverListConnector::onCreateTouched, XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL);
00065     m_lsnOnReleaseTouched = m_release->onTouch().connectWeak(shared_from_this(),
00066                                                              &XDriverListConnector::onReleaseTouched, XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL);
00067 }
00068 
00069 void
00070 XDriverListConnector::onCatch(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node) {
00071     shared_ptr<XDriver> driver(dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(node));
00072     if(m_lsnOnRecord)
00073         driver->onRecord().connect(m_lsnOnRecord);
00074     else
00075         m_lsnOnRecord = driver->onRecord().connectWeak(
00076             shared_from_this(), &XDriverListConnector::onRecord);
00077   
00078     int i = m_pItem->numRows();
00079     m_pItem->insertRows(i);
00080     m_pItem->setText(i, 0, driver->getLabel().c_str());
00081     // typename is not set at this moment
00082     m_pItem->setText(i, 1, driver->getTypename().c_str());
00083 
00084     m_cons.push_back(shared_ptr<tcons>(new tcons));
00085     m_cons.back()->label = new QLabel(m_pItem);
00086     m_pItem->setCellWidget(i, 2, m_cons.back()->label);
00087     m_cons.back()->driver = driver;
00088     m_cons.back()->tlkOnRecordRedirected.reset(new XTalker<tcons::tlisttext>);
00089     m_cons.back()->lsnOnRecordRedirected = m_cons.back()->tlkOnRecordRedirected->connectWeak(
00090         m_cons.back(), &XDriverListConnector::tcons::onRecordRedirected
00091         , XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL | XListener::FLAG_AVOID_DUP | XListener::FLAG_DELAY_ADAPTIVE);
00092 
00093     ASSERT(m_pItem->numRows() == (int)m_cons.size());
00094 }
00095 void
00096 XDriverListConnector::onRelease(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node) {
00097     for(tconslist::iterator it = m_cons.begin(); it != m_cons.end();)
00098     {
00099         ASSERT(m_pItem->numRows() == (int)m_cons.size());
00100         if((*it)->driver == node)
00101         {
00102             (*it)->driver->onRecord().disconnect(m_lsnOnRecord);
00103             for(int i = 0; i < m_pItem->numRows(); i++)
00104             {
00105                 if(m_pItem->cellWidget(i, 2) == (*it)->label)
00106                     m_pItem->removeRow(i);
00107             }
00108             it = m_cons.erase(it);
00109         }
00110         else
00111             it++;
00112     }
00113 }
00114 void
00115 XDriverListConnector::clicked ( int row, int col, int , const QPoint& ) {
00116     for(tconslist::iterator it = m_cons.begin(); it != m_cons.end(); it++)
00117     {
00118         if(m_pItem->cellWidget(row, 2) == (*it)->label)
00119         {
00120             if(col < 3) (*it)->driver->showForms();
00121         }
00122     }
00123 }
00124 
00125 void
00126 XDriverListConnector::onRecord(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &driver)
00127 {
00128     for(tconslist::iterator it = m_cons.begin(); it != m_cons.end(); it++)
00129     {
00130         if((*it)->driver == driver)
00131         {
00132             tcons::tlisttext text;
00133             text.label = (*it)->label;
00134             text.str.reset(new XString((*it)->driver->time().getTimeStr()));
00135             (*it)->tlkOnRecordRedirected->talk(text);
00136         }
00137     }
00138 }
00139 void
00140 XDriverListConnector::tcons::onRecordRedirected(const tlisttext &text)
00141 {
00142     text.label->setText(text.str->c_str());
00143 }
00144 void
00145 XDriverListConnector::onCreateTouched(const shared_ptr<XNode> &)
00146 {
00147     qshared_ptr<DlgCreateDriver> dlg(new DlgCreateDriver(g_pFrmMain));
00148     dlg->setModal(true);
00149     static int num = 0;
00150     num++;
00151     dlg->m_edName->setText(QString("NewDriver%1").arg(num));
00152    
00153     dlg->m_lstType->clear();
00154     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < XDriverList::typelabels().size(); i++) {
00155         dlg->m_lstType->insertItem(XDriverList::typelabels()[i].c_str());
00156     }
00157    
00158     dlg->m_lstType->setCurrentItem(-1);
00159     if(dlg->exec() == QDialog::Rejected) {
00160         return;
00161     }
00162     int idx = dlg->m_lstType->currentItem();
00163     shared_ptr<XNode> driver;
00164     if((idx >= 0) && (idx < (int)XDriverList::typenames().size())) {
00165         if(m_list->getChild(dlg->m_edName->text().toUtf8().data())) {
00166             gErrPrint(i18n("Duplicated name."));
00167         }
00168         else {
00169            driver = m_list->createByTypename(XDriverList::typenames()[idx],
00170                                               dlg->m_edName->text().toUtf8().data());
00171         }
00172     }
00173     if(!driver)
00174         gErrPrint(i18n("Driver creation failed."));
00175 }
00176 void
00177 XDriverListConnector::onReleaseTouched(const shared_ptr<XNode> &)
00178 {
00179     shared_ptr<XDriver> driver;
00180     for(tconslist::iterator it = m_cons.begin(); it != m_cons.end(); it++)
00181     {
00182         if((*it)->label == m_pItem->cellWidget(m_pItem->currentRow(), 2))
00183         {
00184             driver = (*it)->driver;
00185         }
00186     }    
00187     if(driver) m_list->releaseChild(driver);
00188 }
